fullText:
The search for product market fit has fundamentally changed with AI.

Pre AI you had two options: 
1. Ask about a hypothetical nonexistent product

2. Spend 6 months building something then and ask for feedback.

Now you can prototype in 48 hours and get REAL feedback instantly.
